business_hours: Thank you for calling Fulcrum Construction Group in Daphne Alabama. Our regular business hours are 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Monday through Thursday, and 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. on Friday. If you have reached us after hours, please leave a voicemail, and someone will return your call during regular business hours.
